extendedInfo.description: Work Shifts is a simple app that allows you to keep track of your work shifts.**The paid version has no advertisements and a widget that shows the next up-coming shift.**Features:-Add, Edit, and Delete Shifts-Add, Edit, and Delete Preset Shifts-Add, Edit, and Delete Notes-Keep your previous schedules-Highlights the current day-Easily switch to current week-Icon Notification allows you to easily switch to app-Show your pay days-Show how many hours you work each week-Change the start day of the week-Format the date & time-Backup and Restore the database to the sd card

reviews.title: Easiest App out there...But...
reviews.comment: My only request would be you give it the ability to have crossover shifts...I keep track of both  myself and my husband. I would like to not have to run the paid and the free but to see both schedules on one page
reviews.author: Kim Acosta

reviews.title: BEST APP AN EMPLOYEE SHOULD HAVE
reviews.comment: This app is amazing to be organized in your job. Excellent and easy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Improvements maybe?
reviews.comment: This is one of the best apps, simple and to the point. salary wage and over time wage options would be nice.  Good starter app tho. download it, it\'s good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect!!!!
reviews.comment: I love the app and its simplicity, would be great if there was a salary calculator based on the hours you input and displayed in the top left corner by hours also an email function would be awesome.... Fix this and it will be 5 stars!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect for me.
reviews.comment: This would be a 5-star app for me with the addition of the following: 1) Ability to enter and view up to 5 people\'s schedules.; 2)  Ability to enter,store, select, and insert standard, customizable notes such as Day Off..  Other than that, this is hands down THE BEST scheduling app I have found.
reviews.author: Paul Monella

reviews.title: Omg
reviews.comment: I couldn\'t live without this. So easy to use. So easy to add and change information. One of the best apps out there. WONDERFUL WONDERFUL WONDERFUL :-D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No syncing
reviews.comment: This is a great app to keep track of work schedule and hours! My only problem is that I have a nexus 7 tablet and a droid x phone and no way to sync my schedules between devices, I have to manually input in each one :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shifts?
reviews.comment: You have to put ALL your shifts in manually! No Rota or repeat pattern facility. Not really a \'shift worker\', more like just a normal calendar. Not much use for a shift worker on a rota. Easy to use though if its what you need.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mr. PayMe
reviews.comment: I never rate but had to for this app. It\'s been perfect for keeping track of my hours pre pay period. Will give 5 stars if a paycheck calculating function was added.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung s3
reviews.comment: Would be nice to be able to sync with wife\'s schedule and with calendar app. Also would like to have pre-set notes like you can with the shifts. Also would be nice to be able to change to a calendar layout/look
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it even more!!!!
reviews.comment: I liked it a lot before but now I\'m completely in love!!!  Lol good job guys probably my favorite. App :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: For some reason i can\'t add shifts after initial adding it force closes on behold 2 was a great app but now can\'t use it. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!!!
reviews.comment: Simple & really to use I could almost got rid of my diary :-)))
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for keep track of my schedule , total hour, and pay day all with a nice and simple layout
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incredibly handy
reviews.comment: Use it all the time to keep track of when I work. Would be cool if it had some sort of paycheck calculator but awesome either way
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This is perfect for me. I tried about 10 other apps before I found this one. I\'d like the week to start on Monday but that\'s just me being anal - it actually makes no odds. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: It has really helped me to keep track of my ever changing hours.  So simple to use.  I tried a few others, but this works the best for my needs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Was looking for a simple application to organize my part time roster with irregular pattern. Tried many apps but none was as good and straight forward as this one. Many thanks to developers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and Sufficient
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using the little app for a long time and it is just what I need to keep track of my work week. It is extremely simple but just what I need. Im sure the developer could make it more pleasing to the eye but beside that I would and have recommended it to friends.
reviews.author: juan martinez

reviews.title: Absolutely Love!!
reviews.comment: Love this app!!! No more writing my schedule down on paper or a calendar!! This is so much more efficient & time saving. Keeps me so much more organized!!
reviews.author: Michelle Hudson
